title: Client version 6.21.16_10_13_21_40 is rejected by server Help!
body:
Hi,

I am unable to get in the game.  I am using Mac OSX and the game is giving me this message: Client version 6.21.16_10_13_21_40 is rejected by server. Please help me get started.

Thanks!

replies.body:
Hey there,

Simply [running a client repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#mq6) should help resolve this issue.
